brandValues.title: Our Core Values
brandValues.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we create
brandValues.handmade_details: Each of our perfumes is carefully crafted by our expert artisans in the UK in small batches.
brandValues.conscious_details: Luxury perfumes that respect the environment with materials from sustainable sources and ethical production processes.
brandValues.independent_details: As an independent women's initiative, we are proud to be a brand managed with passion and authenticity.
brandValues.premium_details: We offer a unique scent experience using the rarest and highest quality raw materials.
brandValues.artisan_details: Our master perfumers approach each bottle with the meticulousness of a work of art.
brandValues.global_details: We create a universal scent library inspired from all over the world.
brandValues.footer: Crafting exceptional fragrances with passion and purpose since 2023

brandValues.title: Our Core Values
brandValues.subtitle: What makes Hecate truly special
brandValues.handmade_details: We formulate our products without animal testing, using completely plant-based ingredients.
brandValues.conscious_details: Our genderless scents are designed to be suitable for everyone, beyond the female/male distinction.
brandValues.independent_details: As an independent women's initiative, we are proud to be a brand managed with passion and authenticity.
brandValues.premium_details: We offer a unique scent experience using the rarest and highest quality raw materials.
brandValues.footer: Crafting exceptional fragrances with passion and purpose since 2023
